extends java.lang.Object
    List of tools available for genome creation
    Author:
    cbecavin

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void convertAll()
      Convert all genomes available in the database
      static void createEGDeGenomeElementList()
      Create a list of all Genes, all ASrnas, and all CisRegs of EGD-e
      Srnas list is already created in EGDe_SRNA_PATH
      static void createGenomeTable()
      Create Table 1 with the list of Genomes and different infos
      Save in: Project.getPath()+"Table 1 - Genomes.txt"
      static void createHTMLPageSummary()
      Read modify version GENOMENCBI_Table where "chromosome ID"column is first, and create an HTML summary page, allowing to acces quickly to all genome info
      static void createPTTandFAAFiles()
      Some genomes have been downloaded without PTT files so we create them
      PTT files are used by SynTVIew software
      static void downloadAll()
      Download all genomes available in the database
      static void downloadGenomes​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> listGenomes)
      Download new genomes taken from a text file and open all gzip files
      static void searchForSTandCC()
      Concatenate all genomes together and create a huge fasta file.
      static void showAllLocusID()  
      static void verifyAll()
      Load all Genomes created, and save a table with the different information contains in the genomes

      • createHTMLPageSummary

        public static void createHTMLPageSummary()
        Read modify version GENOMENCBI_Table where "chromosome ID"column is first, and create an HTML summary page, allowing to acces quickly to all genome info

      • createPTTandFAAFiles

        public static void createPTTandFAAFiles()
        Some genomes have been downloaded without PTT files so we create them
        PTT files are used by SynTVIew software

      • showAllLocusID

        public static void showAllLocusID()

      • searchForSTandCC

        public static void searchForSTandCC()
        Concatenate all genomes together and create a huge fasta file. Submit it to: http://bigsdb.pasteur.fr/perl/bigsdb/bigsdb.pl?db=pubmlst_listeria_seqdef_public&page=batchSequenceQuery

      • createEGDeGenomeElementList

        public static void createEGDeGenomeElementList()
        Create a list of all Genes, all ASrnas, and all CisRegs of EGD-e
        Srnas list is already created in EGDe_SRNA_PATH
